verses.name: Jeremiah 22:10
verses.text: Weep ye not for the dead, neither bemoan him: but weep sore for him that goeth away: for he shall return no more, nor see his native country.

verses.name: Jeremiah 22:11
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord touching Shallum the son of Josiah king of Judah, which reigned instead of Josiah his father, which went forth out of this place; He shall not return thither any more:

verses.name: Jeremiah 22:12
verses.text: But he shall die in the place whither they have led him captive, and shall see this land no more.
